option.copy: Well, now you’ve got health insurance, but you’ve also reduced your weekly paycheck by almost $70.Even when health insurance is offered, many low-income workers often opt out because they can’t afford the high premiums.

option.copy: A lack of affordable housing is the number one cause of homelessness.The definition of “affordable” housing is 30 percent of income, but you and over 12 million other American households spend way more on housing.
